title: cmd/go: help refers to non-existing runtime.BlockProfileRate
body:
# go help testflag | grep BlockProfile
            runtime.BlockProfileRate to n.  See 'godoc runtime BlockProfileRate'.

but godoc finds no runtime.BlockProfileRate

# godoc runtime BlockProfileRate
PACKAGE DOCUMENTATION

package runtime
    import "runtime"



SUBDIRECTORIES

        cgo
        debug
        pprof
        race

#
